page.title: 02WOODFORD MAY FAIR
page.content: The annual May Fair is held at Middle Woodford in aid of the village hall. A variety of country craft demonstrations, working steam engines,vintage cars and farm artifacts , as well as stands make it an enjoyable family day. On approaching the field excitement rises at the sound of the fair organ & the jingling bells on the children's roundabout. Helicopter rides over the Valley to Stonehenge and back are an added attraction and other entertainments include the Amesbury Drum Majorettes , a Punch & Judy show & an inflatable monster. Hot dogs &toffee apples are very popular & the beer tent sells light refreshments . In the village hall is a delightful exhibition "Granny's Kitchen"_old kitchen equipment. In aid of Woodford Valley churches.
